original_text: This report is about John, the son of Zechariah. It happened when Tiberius Caesar had been the Roman ruler for 15 years. Pontius Pilate was the Roman ruler of Judea. Herod had authority over the region of Galilee. Herod's brother Philip had authority over Iturea and Trachonitis. Lysanias had authority over Abilene.
korean_text: 디베료 황제가 통치한 지 열다섯 해 곧 본디오 빌라도가 유대의 총독으로, 헤롯이 갈릴리의 분봉 왕으로, 그 동생 빌립이 이두래와 드라고닛 지방의 분봉 왕으로, 루사니아가 아빌레네의 분봉 왕으로,

sentences.original_text: It happened when Tiberius Caesar had been the Roman ruler
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 티베리우스 가이사가 로마 통치자였을 때 일어났습니다

sentences.original_text: Pontius Pilate was the Roman ruler of Judea
Herod had authority over the region of Galilee
Herod's brother Philip had authority over Iturea
sentences.korean_translation: 헤롯의 동생 빌립은 이투레아의 권한을 가졌습니다
